gold.user: User wants to create a new address for their Twilio account to manage shipping and billing.
gold.ideal: Successfully creates a new address with the provided details.

gold.user: User needs to retrieve a list of all addresses associated with their Twilio account for review.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of addresses with their details.

gold.user: User wants to delete an address that is no longer needed from their Twilio account.
gold.ideal: Successfully deletes the specified address and confirms the action.

gold.user: User wants to fetch the details of a specific address to verify its information.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified address.

gold.user: User needs to update the details of an existing address to correct an error.
gold.ideal: Successfully updates the address with the new information provided.
